Burning Memory

Group project - Transformative Interactive Narrative Design

In this two week course, we were given the assignment of creating an interactive experience about a chosen defense mechanism. We created a short game with the theme of escapism.

My role in this project was developer, technical designer and technical artist.

Play!

The following ‘glitch’ effect was made to show discrepancies in the world, and was activated near the end of the experience. It is made by distorting the UV’s, and adding intense chromatic aberration.
